page.shortlink: api a5 del fields fm table function
page.description: Removes fields from a table. Field_list is a crlf list of fields to be removed.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5_del_fields_fm_table(C tablename ,C field_list )

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The table contain the fields. Character

argument.name: field_list
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of fields to remove from the table. Character

page.discussion: The A5_DEL_FIELDS_FM_TABLE() function removes the fields in Field_List from Tablename.
